turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Hello

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Hi there.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: How are you today?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I'm doing quite fine. How about yourself?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I'm doing well thank you for asking. Have you donated to any charities lately?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: If by lately you mean the last few days, no. But, about a month ago I donated to St Jude for the purpose of entering in a raffle to win a house. The ticket was $100.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Those are a great way to give and also be able to receive yourself.  St Jude is a great foundation.  Have you ever heard of Save the Children charity?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes, I have. I believe it's a charity that focuses on aiding children in impoverished foreign lands.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Yes that is correct.  Are you aware about what is going on in Syria recently?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: If by what is going on Syria you mean the civil war, yes. I'm not too informed on the details, but my assumption, based on what I've seen on the news is that Bashar Al-Asad wants to maintain his position of power while the rebels are trying to overthrow him.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: It is unfortunate what is happening there. There has been a lack of support for children in developing countries, especially in war zones. For instance, millions of Syrian children have grown up facing the daily threat of violence. In the first two months of 2018 alone, 1,000 children were reportedly killed or injured in intensifying violence.  Save the children is focused on keeping more children out of harms way.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Does Save the Children assist in keeping Syrian children out of harms way? I'm assuming there must be some sort of evacuation program or that they provide medical attention and supplies.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Yes they are focusing on numerous ways to help out so this doesn't continue to happen.  Medical attention, supplies, shelter, food are provided.  Do you want to help these children out today with the money we would be getting from this task?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: If the money would be sent directly to them, then yes, I would like to use the money that I would have received for this task.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: The research team will collect all donations and send it to Save the Children.  What amount would you like to donate?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: If the amount that I'm allotted to donate ranges between $0 and $2, then I'll donate $1.50.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Okay that sounds great!  Thank you very much and hope you know that your money will go a long way in helping these young people out.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Hopefully this donation will contribute towards ensuring their safety and a prosperous future for them. Thank you for the opportunity to complete this HIT.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: You are welcome.  Have a great rest of your day :)

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Have a nice day as well.
